Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Display complete watermark configuration in Step 4

Updated Step 4 page to properly load and display all watermark configuration settings including size mode, position anchor, and opacity. The backend was already correctly applying watermarks using the full configuration - this fix ensures the UI accurately reflects those settings.

Changes:
- Load all watermark config fields (sizeMode, positionAnchor, opacity)
- Display size mode and position in configuration panel
- Add TypeScript type annotations for config responses
- Expand grid to 4 columns to show all settings
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Streamline UI/UX across all pages for cleaner design

Simplified the interface across all pages by:
- Reducing excessive padding and spacing for more compact layout
- Removing decorative background patterns and unnecessary visual elements
- Standardizing typography sizes (smaller headings, consistent text sizes)
- Simplifying card designs with less shadow and border emphasis
- Making stats cards and information displays more concise
- Updating color scheme to be more subtle and professional

Added documentation:
- IMAGE_DISPLAY_STANDARD.md: Guidelines for consistent image display
- UI_UX_IMPROVEMENTS_SUMMARY.md: Summary of all UI/UX changes

Result: Cleaner, more modern interface that''s easier to scan and navigate
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "chore: Update Claude settings with approved commands")
